key_points: Tom Brady retired "for good" following the 2022-23 NFL season after playing his final season with an 8-9 record with the Buccaneers.
The Tampa Bay Buccaneers have handed over the quarterback responsibilities to Baker Mayfield, previously with the Panthers and Rams.
Baker Mayfield secured a one-year deal with the Buccaneers potentially worth $8.5 million.
The Buccaneers re-signed corner Jamel Dean and linebacker Lavonte David, and signed running back Chase Edmonds during the offseason.
Pittsburgh interior defender Calijah Kancey, selected 19th overall, highlights the Buccaneers' 2023 draft class.
Tampa Bay is set to open its season on the road against Minnesota on Sept. 10, with an over/under win total of 6.5.
